title: Riot's dumb password requirements!!!
body: So this pass week my account's password was accidentally reset, and when i go to put in my old password as the "new" password they tell me oh sorry this password is too weak. Too weak my butt ive used the same passowrd for a few years aswell as for other games and it never has failed. This is really dumb your definition on too weak needs to change because this is frustrating me alot !!!! I WANT TO USE MY OLD PASSWORD!!!!!

replies.body: [Account security](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) is really important to us, so it's no surprise that requirements may adjust over time.  It sucks that you can't use your old password, but it may ultimately be in your favor.  Sorry for the trouble!

Man not too be rude or anything but im really not impressed at all becuz it makes no sense. None of my friends have had their account messed up and i havnt even heard of anyone either so why the sudden change it makes absolute no sense at all and its frustrating. This game used to be one of my favorites but theres been so many changes whether small or big that have made my opinion change, and yeah ik my opinion doesnt matter that much bc hey im just silver/bronze and im not famous so of course why even listen to me.

I'm in the NA region, having the same problem with my password. My password wasn't accepted when I tried to login so I changed it and literally none of my other passwords worked either and they met the requirements.
